full_summary:
### Goods Procurement ACAN

#### Tender Reference: WS4576447277-Doc4576466450

### Overview
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) has issued an Advance Contract Award Notice (ACAN) for a Goods Procurement contract for software maintenance and support services. The contract is scheduled to start on **2024-05-09** and end on **2024-05-24**.

### Details

* **Contract Number:** WS4576447277-Doc4576466450
* **Publication Date:** 2024-05-09
* **Tender Closing Date:** 2024-05-24T14:00:00
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** 2024-05-09
* **Expected Contract End Date:** 2024-05-24
* **Tender Status:** Expiré
* **Procurement Category:** Goods
* **Trade Agreements:** This procurement is subject to the Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA), Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA), Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, and Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA).
* **Regions of Opportunity:** None
* **Regions of Delivery:** National Capital Region (NCR)
* **Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **End User Entity:** Canada Border Services Agency (CBSA)
* **Contact Information:**
	+ Name: Hassan Tfaili
	+ Email: [hassan.tfaili@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:hassan.tfaili@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
	+ Phone: None
	+ Fax: None

### External Notice URL and Attachments
None

### Brief Desciption of Tender
This is a Goods Procurement ACAN for software maintenance and support services. The contract was issued for software and software maintenance and support. Please note that the tender status is **Expir
